title: Taxonomic insights into ethereum smart contracts by linking application categories to security vulnerabilities
Complex Systems Oriented Approach for dApps Analysis
DApps ecosystems: mapping the network structure of smart contract interactions
A Curated Solidity Smart Contracts Repository of Metrics and Vulnerability
notes: Our primary goal is to provide a resource for the community that supports exploratory analysis, such as investigating the relationship between contract metrics and vulnerability occurrences

title: A Preliminary Analysis of Software Metrics in Decentralised Applications
notes: Inheritance depth, CBO, State var count
avg local var, max local var, no of functions

title: Mindthedapp: a toolchain for complex network-driven structural analysis of ethereum-based decentralised applications
The network structure of smart contracts in ethereum dapps
notes: we will reconstruct and analyse the network of contracts and functions calls within the dApp which could be helpful to unveil possible vulnerabilities that can be exploited by malicious attackers.

title: DAI: A Dependencies Analyzer and Installer For Solidity Smart Contracts
notes: a novel tool that automates the identification of compatible external dependency versions for specific smart contracts
